name: Exist.EXE (skyfeathergames)
description:
Exist.EXE is a Puzzle JRPG about a game developer who finds himself trapped in a distorted reflection of a game he made. With an emphasis on hacking, the game presents a different gameplay experience to players. Exist.EXE possesses puzzle elements that encourage players to think outside the box. There's also a unique combat system that is reminiscent of the JRPG turn based combat with a twist. Hack the combat system by placing Hacks to tweak skills' effect values, redirect damage, and more. Join Marcus as he uncovers the secrets of the game in his journey of self-discovery.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Note : This is the alpha version of Exist.EXE and might not represent the final product.

Your feedback and suggestions are very important to us! Please help us improve the game by filling the survey after you played the game: https://forms.gle/yEEdk8ZkdpvS1B9s7

If you encounter any bugs or problems in the game and would like to report it, please join our Discord and report it to us https://discord.gg/rebuvUqVxv
